title: Activist Investor Ancora Urges Berry Global to Explore a Sale
sub_head: Ancora owns about 1% of the packaging manufacturer; Berry Global has a roughly $9 billion market value
body:
Activist investor Ancora Holdings Inc. is pushing Berry Global Group Inc., a packaging manufacturer with a roughly $9 billion market value, to explore a sale.
Ancora, which owns about 1% of Berry Global, is urging it to explore strategic alternatives including a possible sale and make other changes, according to a copy of a letter the activist sent to the companyâ€™s board Sunday that was viewed by The Wall Street Journal.
